reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Makes complex topics easy to understand. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but sometimes rushes through material. Lab sessions could be better organized.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Tough but fair. Homework is demanding but prepares you well for exams.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Incorporates real-world examples. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Monotonous lectures. Relies too heavily on textbook. Grading seems arbitrary at times.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex concepts. Lab work is well-structured and informative.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts, but can be intimidating in class discussions.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking lectures. Encourages critical thinking. Very approachable.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Makes economics interesting with real-world applications. Challenging problem sets.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable about the subject, but lectures can be dry. Good visual aids.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Engaging discussions on current events. Fair grader. Excellent at explaining complex political systems.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research incorporated into lectures. Demanding but rewarding course.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Often goes off on tangents. Grading criteria are unclear. Office hours are not very helpful.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Passionate about sustainability. Field trips are informative. Inspiring lecturer.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good practical knowledge, but could improve on teaching methods. Group projects are well-designed.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating insights into language structure. Assignments are challenging but interesting.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional at breaking down complex musical concepts. Patient and encouraging.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but lectures can be disorganized. Fieldwork component is valuable.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Makes stats accessible and relevant. Good balance of theory and practical applications.
